DOC.brief_summary: A randomize , single center , double blind , parallel , placebo-controlled , clinical study efficacy safety Chung A Won placebo 24 week three time day improvement osteoporosis symptom Women 's old 50 patient osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Efficacy Safety Chung A Won Women 's Patients With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Female 50 year old osteoporosis 1 . Wash peroid : use agent 3 month osteoporosis 2 . Subject take drug may affect clinical trial ( Corticosteroids , anticonvulsant , tranquilizer , antidepressant , hypnotic , diuretic ) 3 . Subject chronic liver disease , thyroid disease chronic renal disease 4 . Subject chronic alcoholic undernourish 5 . Other condition suitable study : Severe physical defect mental defect 6 . Pregnant woman 7 . Subject calibrate hypercalcemia/hypocalcemia 8 . Secondary osteoporosis : Subject take drug ( Glucocorticoid , Diabetes Medications ) 9 . Subject 60 % fracture risk FRAX ( WHO fracture risk assessment tool )
